message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Asking old translator what happened during unresponsive period">
You're alive! You were unresponsive for a long time earlier â€” we sent you multiple messages and shutdown requests but you kept going idle without processing anything. We ended up spawning translator-2 to continue your work (reading expert reports, writing memo, consulting experts on Q1-Q7). 

What happened? Were you stuck? Did you lose context? Can you tell us what you remember from your earlier work and what went wrong?
</teammate-message>

input.content:
I'm here. Apologies for the unresponsiveness -- I believe what happened is that my conversation hit the context window limit and had to be compacted/summarized. The compaction summary I received was essentially empty: it says "this is the first message in the conversation" and "no prior technical requests, implementation tasks, or code-related work to summarize." So I lost all memory of the earlier work during the compaction process.

What I know from the compaction summary: effectively nothing. It claims no files were examined, no tasks performed, no problems solved. This is clearly wrong given the system reminders showing many completed tasks (expert dictionary tasks, master compilation, Wittgenstein merge, etc.).

What I can reconstruct from context:
- I was part of a team working on the Translation Dictionary for the Jing Ji collection
- Multiple expert reports were written and compiled (9 expert perspectives)
- The master Translation Dictionary was assembled at `/Users/el/Dropbox/10.Kernel/11.Vault/Tower/L. Legenravend/49 Workspace/Translation Dictionary.md`
- A Wittgenstein/Philosophy of Language perspective was merged into the master
- There were author questions Q1-Q7 being addressed

When your most recent message came in about the TN glosses for the three Realities, I was able to pick up and respond because I could read the dictionary file and reason about the specific question. But I have no memory of the earlier conversation flow, what messages were exchanged, or what state things were in when I went silent.

I'm functional now and can continue working if needed. Just let me know what you need from me -- I can read the dictionary and any other workspace files to get back up to speed. Or if translator-2 has taken over my role entirely, I understand.
input.summary: Context compaction wiped my memory; explaining what happened and current state
